planinformasjon.infotekst: P>As a student at University of Stavanger you have to read and understand your rights and duties. For the time being some or all of these links may not be active, or may only be available in Norwegian.
Academic Misconduct (Cheating during exams or tests, or plagiarism)
I am obliged to read and understand the Regulations relating to Examinations at the University of Stavanger Adopted by the Board of Trustees of the University of Stavanger on 25 March 2010.
Act relating to universities and university colleges
This page is for the time being only available in Norwegian.
Information about registration to classes and examinations (this page is only available in Norwegian).
Borrowing rules and prices at University Library of Stavanger
I understand that important information may be published electronically, and that I am obliged to check my e-mail box and personal page.
I understand that the general part of my study plan contains important information which I am obliged to read and understand.

emnekombinasjon.emnekombinasjonsnavn: Teacher Education for the General School 2006 - 2010
emnekombinasjon.beskrivelse: Teacher Education for the General School

emne.emnenavn: Mathematics 1, Topic 1; Numbers, Statistics and Probability Calculus
Mathematics 1, Topic 2; Geometry, Algebra and Functional Mathematics
Basic Education in Reading, Writing and Mathematics

emnekombinasjon.beskrivelse:
According to the general plan of 2003 the elective part of the Study Program should consist of 120 SP. These must include at least 60 SP in subjects corresponding to subjects from primary school. The subjects can be a continuation of subjects in the compulsory part of the program, or new subjects consisting of at least 30 SP. They must include didactics and a practical placement. 60 SP at most could be other subjects relevant for teaching. UiS decides whether the subjects are relevant or not for primary school teaching.

You are yourself responsible for choosing subjects that will satisfy the requirements for teacher education.

emnekombinasjon.emnekombinasjonsnavn: One-year courses - choose one of the following combinations

emnekombinasjon.beskrivelse: 60 credits - equivalent to the first year of the master's degree in Special Education.

Arts and Crafts I, Topic 3: Sculpture
Arts and Crafts II - Topic 5: Architecture
Arts and Crafts II - Topic 4: Design and Function
Arts and Crafts II - Topic 6: Research and Development

emnekombinasjon.beskrivelse: KRL 3 består av emner som også tilbys på fordypning i KRL. Det er knyttet forkunnskapskrav til alle emner på fordypningsnivå (bestått minimum 50 i samme fagområde på lavere nivå)
